about.heading: Complete Web Experience Creator
about.paragraph1: With 5 years of experience in web development, I master the entire application creation cycle: from initial web design with Figma to production deployment. My versatility allows me to work with React, Vue.js, and Angular according to project needs.
about.paragraph2: Graduate of BES WEBDEVELOPER from Paul Hankar Institute in Brussels and passionate self-taught developer, I continue to train regularly, notably through Technocit√©. This thirst for learning allows me to stay at the cutting edge of technology and offer innovative solutions.
about.paragraph3: My expertise covers frontend/backend deployment, database management with DBeaver, automation via cron/Putty, service integration (mailing, Twilio), and Docker usage. I ensure that every project is tested, performant, and maintainable.
